org.apache.flink.runtime.checkpoint.savepoint

接口 SavepointStore

  • 所有已知实现类:
    FsSavepointStore, HeapSavepointStore

    public interface SavepointStore
    Savepoint store used to persist Savepoint instances.

    The main implementation is the FsSavepointStore. We also have the HeapSavepointStore for historical reasons (introduced in Flink 1.0).

    • 方法概要

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void disposeSavepoint(String path, ClassLoader classLoader)
      Disposes the savepoint at the specified path.
      Savepoint loadSavepoint(String path)
      Loads the savepoint at the specified path.
      void shutdown()
      Shut downs the savepoint store.
      <T extends Savepoint>
      String      		 storeSavepoint(T savepoint)
      Stores the savepoint.

    • 方法详细资料

      • storeSavepoint

        <T extends Savepoint> String storeSavepoint(T savepoint)
                                     throws Exception
        Stores the savepoint.
        类型参数:
        T - Savepoint type
        参数:
        savepoint - Savepoint to be stored
        返回:
        Path of stored savepoint
        抛出:
        Exception - Failures during store are forwarded

      • loadSavepoint

        Savepoint loadSavepoint(String path)
                 throws Exception
        Loads the savepoint at the specified path.
        参数:
        path - Path of savepoint to load
        返回:
        The loaded savepoint
        抛出:
        Exception - Failures during load are forwared

      • disposeSavepoint

        void disposeSavepoint(String path,
                      ClassLoader classLoader)
               throws Exception
        Disposes the savepoint at the specified path.

        The class loader is needed, because savepoints can currently point to arbitrary snapshot StateHandle instances, which need the user code class loader for deserialization.

        参数:
        path - Path of savepoint to dispose
        classLoader - Class loader for disposal
        抛出:
        Exception - Failures during diposal are forwarded

      • shutdown

        void shutdown()
       throws Exception
        Shut downs the savepoint store.

        Only necessary for implementations where the savepoint life-cycle is bound to the cluster life-cycle.

        抛出:
        Exception - Failures during shut down are forwarded
